settings.editor: Hackerz is an annual tech-fest hosted by the Information Technology department of Sri Sairam Engineering College. We have a range of activities and challenges that are both fun and educational for all geeks out there. It is a culmination of both, fun and technology.

The Department of Information Technology starting from the year 1999 with an admission of 44 students has now heightened to a sterling input of 180 students. The Department is supported by staunch and steadfast squad of 37 faculty. For the students to be au courant of the newest technologies and the developments occurring in the field of information technology, the department takes the utmost and due concern by marshalling Guest lectures, seminars, workshops and training programs with the aid of “The Best” engineers and academicians from national and international reputes.

Students are made to sharpen and rally their knowledge on the future technology by mastering the art of computing and supporting them to think futuristic by begetting Research ad Research related activities through the Research and Development cell. As a result of the efforts the department has made and in due endeavours the students have made their flags high in various national and international forums.

About Us Sri Sairam Engineering College, Chennai, established in the year 1995 by MJF.Ln.Leo Muthu, Chairman of Sapthagiri Educational Trust, is a non-profitable and a non-minority institution. A well-defined vision, highly committed mission and a dedicated leadership facilitate Sri Sairam Engineering College to be in the best of educational institutions in the country. Since its inception, the institution has grown into a vast conglomerate of magnificent buildings, state-of-the art laboratories, sophisticated internet centres, modern digital library block and a superlative sports complex, each a land mark in itself across 300 acres.
